bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names nie shang 齧傷.

Pathological Condition of a shang sun 傷損 , injury, resulting from bites of an animal or a human. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 139 ：治一切金刃箭鏃傷中，及打撲傷損，貓犬咬傷，或至死者，急 於傷處摻藥 , “To cure all types of injuries from metal [objects, including] blades and arrowheads, as well as injuries from a blow, and harm from bites of cats and dogs that may be fatal, attach [this] medication quickly to the location of the injury”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 lists the following as potential causes of harm from a bite: zhi quan 猘犬 , rabid dog (AN zhi gou 猘狗 , kuang quan 狂犬 , dian quan 顛犬 , kuang gou 狂狗 ); wu song 蜈蚣 , centipede; she xie 蛇蠍 , snakes and scorpions; she hui 蛇虺 , venomous snake; zhu chong 諸蟲 , all types of bugs/worms; bai chong 百蟲 , the hundred/all bugs/worms; hu quan 虎犬 , tigers and dogs; ren 人 , human person.
